Caption: Prof. Sampath addressing the audience at the Special Convocation. On the dais, from left- Mr.Sethunathan, Prof.Sampath, Dr.Edhard Eppler, Mr.Subramanian (Union Minister), KV Pandalay ( Director), Prof.Ramachandran
Album: Album 0227: 1. Special Convocation 2. Computer center 16-11-1973 to 17-11-1973
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
